short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GetSummary is a browser extension that summarizes the content of the current page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description:
GetSummary is a powerful Chrome extension designed to enhance your browsing experience by providing quick and concise summaries of web pages. With just a simple right-click, you can access the "Get Summary" option in the context menu. Upon selecting this option, a sidebar will automatically open, presenting a summarized version of the current webpage's content.

Key Features:

Effortless Summarization: Instantly generate summaries with a single right-click.
Sidebar Interface: The summary appears in a convenient sidebar, allowing you to continue browsing while reviewing the key points.
Time-Saving: Quickly grasp the main ideas of lengthy articles or documents without having to read through the entire content.
How to Use:

Right-click anywhere on the webpage.
Select "GetSummary" from the context menu.
The sidebar will open, displaying a summarized version of the page.
Benefits:

Enhanced Productivity: Save time by quickly understanding the core content of web pages.
Improved Focus: Easily identify the most important information without distractions.
User-Friendly: Simple and intuitive interface ensures a seamless user experience.
GetSummary is the perfect tool for researchers, students, professionals, and anyone who needs to quickly digest online content. Install now and experience the convenience of instant summarization!
